channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
okay to get something clear plz dont start swearing and stuff like that i know this is noobish but im not the greatest with computers
down to question i need help findding the correct path to my java so i can run my server plz and ty

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

your right. That does not go into your environmental variables

you make a new PATH called JAVA and make the path to where your Java JDK/Bin is located at.

What Get_Forgotten provided was for the RunServer

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @mikeyismyname mikeyismyname
item.description:
@mikeyismyname wrote:

[quote=“Get_Forgotten, post:2, topic:283033”]@echo off title server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
There ya go[/quote]
i dont think that goes into my enviorment variables

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

@echo off title server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

There ya go
